author: cnbc.com
title: TITLE Boxing Club Enhances Leadership with New Director of Franchise Development
text:
OVERLAND PARK, Kan., In a strategic effort to further ignite domestic and international expansion, TITLE Boxing Club , the nation's fastest-growing boxing franchise, announced today the addition of its new Director of Franchise Development. Newly appointed, Todd Haavind, carries a proven track record of success and an expertise in growing businesses with plans to take the TITLE brand to new heights.
Todd brings over 20 years' of multi-unit sales, franchise development and process enhancement experience to his new role, having worked throughout the franchise industry for companies such as Beeline Bikes, Mrs. Fields TCBY, Homewatch CareGivers International, Quiznos and Cici's Pizza, among others. Todd comes to TITLE most recently from Dickey's Barbeque Restaurants, where he served as the vice president of franchise sales.
"We are excited to welcome Todd to the TITLE Boxing Club team and are confident that his wealth of knowledge in the franchising space, paired with his passion for fitness is the perfect fit to help ignite continued brand growth," said Susan Boresow, President of TITLE Boxing Club. "2017 represented a milestone year of growth for TITLE and we look forward to further accelerating our brand footprint into 2018 with the senior leadership addition of Todd."
In his new role, Todd will be tasked with providing strategic leadership and direction for the franchise sales division in addition to streamlining lead generation process that will improve the overall franchise sales process. Todd is also looking to further develop the brand in urban markets, including Chicago, Denver, Austin, Atlanta, Houston, St. Louis, Seattle, Portland, Las Vegas, New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Los Angeles, Phoenix and Washington, D.C. His growth goals include signing more than 50 franchise agreements in 2018.
"In the boutique fitness industry, TITLE Boxing Club continues to lead with strong brand recognition and a powerful growth trajectory," says Haavind. "It gives me great pride knowing I am joining a brand that I truly believe in and can get behind. I am excited to be able to put my development experience to work in growing the TITLE brand and in turn, positively impacting the lives of many members to come."
Founded in 2008, TITLE Boxing Club started franchising in 2009 and has since exploded both domestically and internationally. With a solid franchise model that makes owning and operating a club easy and profitable combined with the workout that helps members reach and exceed their health and fitness goals, the company shows no signs of slowing down.
For more information about TITLE Boxing Club's franchise opportunity, visit https://titleboxingclub.com/own-a-franchise/ .
About TITLE Boxing Club Â®
TITLE Boxing Club, a Franworth company, is a boutique fitness studio that specializes in boxing and kickboxing fitness classes. Based in Kansas City, the company has more than 170 clubs open and operating across the country and another 250 in development. The brand is currently ranked on Entrepreneur magazine's prestigious Franchise 500 list and the Inc. 5000 list of American's fastest-growing, privately-held companies. In addition, TITLE Boxing Club is No. 387 on Franchise Times Top 200 (Plus 300) list. To learn more about the fitness franchise opportunity, visit https://titleboxingclub.com/own-a-franchise/ .
